title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 7856.6 - Workforce utilization
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 7856.6 - Workforce utilization

State Regulations

The board may require the submission by major energy
suppliers of labor market information, including but not limited to labor
market characteristics such as jobs, staffing patterns, skill requirements, educational and training needs, earnings, career ladder opportunities, occupational trends and labor supply/demand assessment, in order to inform the
coordination of energy policy and workforce utilization activities, and to
ensure that the operation and necessary expansion of the energy sector is not
inhibited by a shortage of skilled workers. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
7856.6

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
